name: learning-on-climate-change-and-food-security
notes: A wide variety of learning materials for technical audiences including concepts, policies, practices, webinars and techniques for food security in the context of climate change.
title: Learning on climate change and food security

resources.name: Climate change and food security
resources.description: This course provides an overview of the impacts of climate change on food security. It also introduces climate-smart agriculture and practices that contribute to climate change adaptation, mitigation, food security and development.
Seven webinars where experts discuss about effects of climate change on food secutiry, including socio economic aspects and climate change adaptation.
resources.name: Webinars on climate change, food security and nutrition

groups.name: climate-change-adaptation
groups.title: Climate change adaptation and resilience
groups.description: Climate change threatens our ability to ensure global food security, eradicate poverty and achieve sustainable development. Greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions from human activity and livestock are a significant driver of climate change, trapping heat in the earth's atmosphere and triggering global warming.

groups.title: Food Security and Nutrition
groups.name: food-security-and-nutrition
groups.description: The 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development and the UN Decade of Action on Nutrition 2016â€“2025 call on all countries and stakeholders to act together to end hunger and prevent all forms of malnutrition by 2030.

organization.description: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
organization.title: FAO
organization.name: fao
